content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Mining and Smelting Setup at (-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Stone furnace at (-27.0, -59.0)
- Burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5)
- Wooden chest at (-26.5, -57.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup at (1, -60)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (1.0, -60.0)
- Stone furnace at (2.0, -56.0)
- Burner inserter at (1.5, -57.5)
- Wooden chest at (1.5, -58.5)

### Iron Smelting Array at (1, 1)
Consists of:
- Three stone furnaces at (1.0, 1.0), (3.0, 1.0)
- Three burner inserters at (1.5, 2.5), (3.5, 2.5), (5.5, 2.5)
- Three wooden chests at (1.5, 3.5), (3.5, 3.5), (5.5, 3.5)

### Copper Cable Production Line at (14.5, 14.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (14.5, 14.5)
- Input chest at (14.5, 11.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 14.5)
- Burner inserters at (14.5, 12.5), (12.5, 14.5)

### Electronic Circuit Production Line at (21.5, 15.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (21.5, 15.5)
- Input chests at (21.5, 11.5)
- Output chest at (24.5, 15.5)
- Burner inserters at (21.5, 13.5), (23.5, 15.5)

### Power Generation Setup
Consists of:
- Boiler at (37.5, 19.0)
- Steam engine at (43.5, 19.5)
- Offshore pump at (-7.5, 25.5)
- Multiple pipe groups connecting these components

### Transport System
Multiple belt groups connecting various production facilities:
- Belt systems running from mining areas to smelting areas
- Belt systems connecting smelters to assembly machines
- Belt systems for moving products between different production stages

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with connecting fluid entities
- Ensure you have the required pipes in inventory before attempting to connect fluid entities
- Check if the connection points between fluid entities are within reasonable distance

### Entity power issues
- Ensure power generating structures (steam engine, boiler) are properly connected with pipes and fuel
- Connect all electrical entities to the power network using electrical poles

### Production line stalling
- Ensure input materials are available for assembling machines
- Check if output inventories have space for produced items
- Verify inserters have fuel and are correctly oriented for input/output operations

### Resource depletion issues
- Keep mining drills fueled to maintain continuous operation
- Monitor furnace fuel levels to maintain continuous smelting operations
